task: Find out where and when the most recent UEFA Champions League final was held, and which team won.
Find out where and when the most recent UEFA Champions League final was held, and which team won.
user_action_and_explanation: type 'UEFA Champions League final 2023 winner' into the search bar. This action is optimal because it directly searches for the specific event needed to find out where and when the most recent UEFA Champions League final was held and which team won. The search bar is the primary interactive element on the page to input search queries, identified by its centered position under the Google logo.
observation: The search query successfully brought up relevant information. The most recent UEFA Champions League final was held at the Atatürk Olympic Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey, on June 10, 2023. Manchester City F.C. won the final by defeating Inter Milan 1-0, with Rodri scoring the decisive goal. Manchester City F.C. is confirmed as the winner of the 2023 final.

task: Find out where and when the most recent UEFA Champions League final was held, and which team won.
observation: The most recent observations indicate that the 2023 UEFA Champions League final took place at the Atatürk Olympic Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey, on June 10, 2023. Manchester City F.C. won the final against Inter Milan with a score of 1-0, thanks to a second-half goal by Rodri, who was named the man of the match. The screenshots confirm this information, displaying snippets from reputable sources like Wikipedia, noting the attendance and providing additional details about the event.
